title: wheres my bonus RP? rito?
body: i bought RP and OCE doesn't have the bonus RP sale like other servers ATM O.o??? hello why you do dis

replies.body:
Hey inducedshadow,

There's indeed a bonus RP sale going on! For more information, check out the announcement, linked below. 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time
